Verses: 1 pinbu, Avan Than Veettu Visaaranaikkaaranai Nokki: Nee Indha Manidharudaiya Saakkugalai Avargal Etrikkondupogaththakka Paaramaaith Dhaaniyaththinaale Nirappi, Avanavan Panaththai Avanavan Saakkin Vaayile Pottu,
2 ilaiyavanudaiya Saakkin Vaayile Vellippaaththiramaagiya En Paanapaaththiraththaiyum Dhaaniyaththukku Avan Koduththa Panaththaiyum Podu Endru Kattalaiyittaan; Yoseppu Sonnabadiye Avan Seydhaan.
3 adhigaalaiyile Andha Manidhargal Thangal Kazhudhaigalai Ottikkondupogumbadi Anuppividappattaargal.

4 avargal Pattanaththai Vittuppurappattu, Vegudhooram Povadharku Munne, Yoseppu Than Veettu Visaaranaikkaaranai Nokki: Nee Purappattuppoi, Andha Manidharaip Pinthodarndhu, Avargalaip Pidiththu: Neengal Nanmaikkuth Theemai Seydhadhu Enna?
5 adhu En Ejamaan Paanampannugira Paaththiram Allavaa? Adhu Ponavagai Gnaanadhirushtiyaal Avarukkuth Theriyaadhaa? Neengal Seydhadhu Thagaadhakaariyam Endru Avargalode Sol Endraan.
6 avan Avargalaith Thodarndhu Pidiththu, Thannidaththil Solliyirundha Vaarththaigalai Avargalukkuch Sonnaan.
7 adharku Avargal: Engal Aandavan Ippadippatta Vaarththaigalaich Sollukiradhu Enna? Ippadippatta Kaariyaththukkum Ummudaiya Adiyaaraagiya Engalukkum Vegudhooram.

8 engal Saakkugalin Vaayile Naangal Kanda Panaththaik Kaanaandhesaththilirundhu Thirumba Ummidaththukkuk Konduvandhome; Naangal Ummudaiya Ejamaanin Veettilirundhu Velliyaiyaagilum, Ponnaiyaagilum Thirudikkondu Povomaa?
9 ummudaiya Adiyaarukkulle Adhu Evanidaththil Kaanappadumo Avan Kolaiyundagakadavan; Naangalum Engal Aandavanukku Adimaigalaavom Endraargal.
10 adharku Avan: Neengal Sonnabadiye Aagattum; Evanidaththil Adhu Kaanappadumo, Avan Enakku Adimaiyaavaan; Neengal Kutramatriruppeergal Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Avargal Thuridhamaai Avanavan Thanthan Saakkaith Tharaiyile Irakki, Thangal Saakkugalaith Thirandhu Vaiththaargal.
12 mooththavan Saakkumudhal Ilaiyavan Saakkumattum Avan Sodhikkumpodhu, Andhap Paaththiram Benyameenudaiya Saakkile Kandupidikkappattadhu.
13 appozhudhu Avargal Thangal Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu, Avanavan Kazhudhaiyinmel Podhiyai Etrikkondu, Pattanaththirkuth Thirumbinaargal.
14 yoodhaavum Avan Sagodhararum Yoseppin Veettukkup Ponaargal. Yoseppu Adhuvaraiyum Ange Irundhaan; Avanukku Munbaagath Tharaiyile Vizhundhaargal.
15 yoseppu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Enna Kaariyam Seydheergal? Ennaip Poloththa Manidhanukku Gnaanadhirushtiyinaal Kaariyam Theriyavarum Endru Ariyaamarponeergalaa Endraan.

16 adharku Yoodhaa: En Aandavanaagiya Ummidaththil Naangal Enna Solluvom? Ennaththaip Pesuvom? Edhinaale Engal Needhiyai Vilangappannuvom? Ummudaiya Adiyaarin Akkiramaththai Dhevan Vilangappanninaar; Paaththiraththai Vaiththirukkiravanum Naangalum En Aandavanukku Adimaigal Endraan.

17 adharku Avan: Appadippatta Seygai Enakkuth Dhooramaayiruppadhaaga; Evan Vasaththil Paaththiram Kandupidikkappattadho, Avane Enakku Adimaiyaayiruppaan; Neengalo Samaadhaanaththode Ungal Thagappanidaththukkup Pongal Endraan.

18 appozhudhu Yoodhaa Avanandaiyile Serndhu: Aa, En Aandavane, Umadhu Adiyen Ummudaiya Sevigal Ketka Oru Vaarththai Sollugiren Ketpeeraaga; Adiyenmel Umadhu Kobam Moolaadhiruppadhaaga; Neer Paarvonukku Oppaayirukkireer.
19 ungalukkuth Thagappanaavadhu Sagodharanaavadhu Undaa Endru En Aandavan Ummudaiya Adiyaaridaththil Ketteer.

20 adharku Naangal: Engalukku Mudhirvayadhulla Thagappanaarum, Avarukku Mudhirvayadhile Pirandha Oru Ilaignanum Undu Endrum, Avanudaiya Thamaiyan Irandhuponaan Endrum, Avan Oruvanmaaththirame Avanaippetra Thaayaarukku Iruppadhinaal Thagappanaar Avanmel Patchamaayirukkiraar Endrum En Aandavanukkuch Sonnom.
21 appozhudhu Neer: Avanai Ennidaththukkuk Konduvaarungal; En Kangalinaal Avanaip Paarkkavendum Endru Umadhu Adiyaarukkuch Sonneer.
22 naangal Aandavanai Nokki: Andha Ilaignan Than Thagappanaivittup Piriyakkoodaadhu, Pirindhaal Avar Irandhupovaar Endru Sonnom.
23 adharku Neer: Ungal Ilaiya Sagodharanaik Konduvaraavittaal, Neengal Ini En Mugaththaik Kaanpadhillai Endru Umadhu Adiyaarukkuch Sonneer.
24 naangal Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya En Thagappanaaridaththukkup Ponapodhu, En Aandavanudaiya Vaarththaigalai Avarukku Ariviththom.
25 engal Thagappanaar Engalai Nokki: Neengal Thirumbappoi, Namakkuk Konjam Dhaaniyam Kollungal Endru Sonnaar.
26 adharku: Naangal Pogakkoodaadhu; Engal Ilaiya Sagodharan Engalode Vandhaal Povom; Engal Ilaiya Sagodharan Engalode Varaavittaal, Naangal Andhap Purushanudaiya Mugaththaikkaanakkoodaadhu Endrom.
27 appozhudhu Ummudaiya Adiyaanaagiya En Thagappanaar: En Manaivi Enakku Irandu Pillaigalaip Petraal;
28 avargalil Oruvan Ennidaththilirundhu Poivittaan, Avan Peerundupoyiruppaan Endrirundhen, Idhuvaraikkum Avanaik Kaanaadhirukkiren, Idhellaam Neengal Arindhirukkireergal.
29 neengal Ivanaiyum Ennai Vittuppiriththu Azhaiththuppogumidaththil Ivanukku Mosam Nerittaal, En Naraimayirai Viyaagulaththode Paadhaalaththil Irangappannuveergal Endraar.
30 aagaiyaal Ilaiyavanai Vittu, Naan En Thagappanaagiya Umadhu Adiyaanidaththukkup Ponaal, Avarudaiya Jeevan Ivanudaiya Jeevanode Ondraai Inaikkappattirukkirabadiyinaal,

31 avar Ilaiyavan Varavillai Endru Arindhamaaththiraththil Irandhupovaar; Ippadi Umadhu Adiyaaraagiya Naangal Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya Engal Thagappanudaiya Naraimayirai Viyaagulaththudane Paadhaalaththil Irangappannuvom.

32 indha Ilaiyavanukkaaga Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya Naan En Thagappanukku Uththaravaadhi; Andriyum, Naan Ivanai Ummidaththukkuk Konduvaraavittaal, Naan Ennaalum Umakku Munbaakak Kutravaaliyaayiruppen Endru Avarukkuch Solliyirukkiren.
33 ippadiyirukka, Ilaiyavan Than Sagodhararodekoodap Pogavidumbadi Mandraadugiren; Ummudaiya Adiyaanaagiya Naan Ilaiyavanukkup Badhilaaga Inge En Aandavanukku Adimaiyaayirukkiren.
34 ilaiyavanai Vittu, Eppadi En Thagappanidaththukkup Poven? Ponaal En Thagappanukku Neridum Theengai Naan Eppadik Kaanpen Endraan.
